item.title: By: Nadiya

item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://applicature.com/blog/token-offerings/how-to-find-best-ico-developers-when-launching-ico/#comment-222">David Otero</a>.
Hi David! Nice to e-meet you. We can provide you our presentation on all a-z services we have for ICOs. Pls fill out a short form: https://applicature.com/contact-us/. Thank you!
